data.message: I've lost 5000 likes in 3 days on my business page... What's going on? That's nearly half of my total likes... It happened in 2 instances. This is ridiculous. What's the use of investing in page exposure if I keep loosing my money?

replies.message: Hey Stéfan. If something's not working with your Page, or you think there's a bug, you can report it to us by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2oouaAh. -Joe
Facebook Thank you Joe. I've done so 3 days ago. I will wait.Thanks!
Facebook No news from Facebook in 5 days.... How long does it take before I get this matter solved? You did take my money and 5000 likes are gone.

Stéfan Breton https://www.bbb.org/greater-san-francisco/business-reviews/online-social-media-networking/facebook-in-menlo-park-ca-385674/reviews-and-complaints Complain about them here, most companies/corporations reply if you file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau. Im giving this link out like how Oprah gave out free cars since Facebook has ignored my problem with uploading pics for 2 days
